languages.text: "Ваш высокобродие, виноват! Не распознал, оплошал! Помилуйте, такая тут у нас мясорубка..."
"My mistake, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! Didn't recognise you, {mf|sir|ma'am}! Please pardon my blunder, it's a bloodbath in here—"
languages.original_text: "Ваш высокобродие, виноват! Не распознал, оплошал! Помилуйте, такая тут у нас мясорубка..."

traits.locale_text: "My mistake, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, {mf|sir|ma'am}! Didn't recognise you, {mf|sir|ma'am}! Please pardon my blunder, it's a bloodbath in here—"
"My mistake, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, {mf|sir|ma'am}! Didn't recognise you, {mf|sir|ma'am}! Please pardon my blunder, it's a bloodbath in here—"
"My mistake, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! Didn't recognise you, {mf|sir|ma'am}! Please pardon my blunder, it's a bloodbath in here—"
"My mistake, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! Didn't recognise you, {mf|sir|ma'am}! Please pardon my blunder, it's a bloodbath in here—"
"My mistake, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! Didn't recognise you, {mf|sir|ma'am}! Please pardon my blunder, it's a bloodbath in here—"
"My mistake, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! Didn't recognise you, {mf|sir|ma'am}! Please pardon my blunder, it's a bloodbath in here—"

languages.text: "Mein Fehler, Euer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}! Ich habe Euch nicht erkannt, {mf|Sir|Madam}! Bitte verzeiht mein Versäumnis, hier herrscht ein Blutbad -"
languages.original_text: "My mistake, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! Didn't recognise you, {mf|sir|ma'am}! Please pardon my blunder, it's a bloodbath in here—"

traits.locale_text: "Mein Fehler, Euer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}! Ich habe Euch nicht erkannt, {mf|Sir|Madam}! Bitte verzeiht mein Versäumnis, hier herrscht ein Blutbad -"

languages.text: « C'est ma faute, Votre Seigneurie ! Je ne vous ai pas {mf|reconnu|reconnue}. Pardonnez mes manières, mais c'est un vrai carnage, ici... »
languages.original_text: "My mistake, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! Didn't recognise you, {mf|sir|ma'am}! Please pardon my blunder, it's a bloodbath in here—"

traits.locale_text: « C'est ma faute, Votre Seigneurie ! Je ne vous ai pas {mf|reconnu|reconnue}. Pardonnez mes manières, mais c'est un vrai carnage, ici... »

languages.text: “是我错了，大人！我没认出您来，长官！请原谅我的失言，这里已经血流成——”
languages.original_text: "My mistake, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! Didn't recognise you, {mf|sir|ma'am}! Please pardon my blunder, it's a bloodbath in here—"

traits.locale_text: “是我错了，大人！我没认出您来，长官！请原谅我的失言，这里已经血流成——”

languages.text: 「失礼しました、陛下！気付きませんでした！失態をお許しください、ここは血の海で…」
languages.original_text: "My mistake, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! Didn't recognise you, {mf|sir|ma'am}! Please pardon my blunder, it's a bloodbath in here—"

traits.locale_text: 「失礼しました！気付きませんでした！失態をお許しください、ここは血の海で…」

languages.text: «¡Fallo mío, mi{mf|lord|lady}! ¡No le había reconocido! Por favor, disculpe mi metedura de pata, esto es una carnicería...».
languages.original_text: "My mistake, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! Didn't recognise you, {mf|sir|ma'am}! Please pardon my blunder, it's a bloodbath in here—"

traits.locale_text: «¡Fallo mío, mi{mf|lord|lady}!». ¡No le había reconocido! Por favor, disculpe mi metedura de pata, esto es una carnicería...».

languages.text: "Affedin {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri! Sizi tanıyamadım efendim! Lütfen hatamı mazur görün, burası kan gölüne..."
languages.original_text: "My mistake, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! Didn't recognise you, {mf|sir|ma'am}! Please pardon my blunder, it's a bloodbath in here—"

traits.locale_text: "Affedin {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri! Sizi tanıyamadım efendim! Lütfen hatamı mazur görün, burası kan gölüne..."
